text:
I tried using a custom selector (added using Project.addTypeDefinition())
in a <zipfileset/> and it failed to recognize it. The same selector
in a plain <fileset/> worked fine.

The documentation for <zipfileset/> says it accepts the same elements as
<fileset/> in addition to .... somehow it is not the case, eventhough 
<zipfileset/> extends <fileset/>.
creator: j_a_fernandez@yahoo.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
It doesn't accept the selector or it doesn't use it?

I just tried

<project>
  <typedef name="foo"
    classname="org.apache.tools.ant.types.selectors.ContainsSelector"/>
  <fileset id="1" dir=".">
    <foo/>
  </fileset>
  <zipfileset id="2" dir=".">
    <foo/>
  </zipfileset>
</project>

and it worked - so foo has been accepted as a selector.
